titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C31

availability.licence: Distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License

body.ab: <lb n="c57-0157__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0157.11" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 18<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0157__main__2"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26394__Start"/>Alas!<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26394__End"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26397__Start"/>reflection in<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26397__End"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26400__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26400__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>my present situation was <lb n="c57-0157__main__3"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26415__Start"/>impossible<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26415__End"/>one in which all <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__1"/>volun<lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__2"/>tary<lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__3"/>thought <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__4"/>was <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__5"/>swallowed <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__6"/>up and <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__7"/>lost. – I was hurried away by fury – Revenge alone <lb n="c57-0157__main__4"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26449__Start"/>inspired<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26449__End"/>endowed me with strength, <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26458__Start"/>& power of action<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26458__End"/>& composure – It <lb n="c57-0157__main__5"/>modelled my feelings & allowed me to be calculating <lb n="c57-0157__main__6"/>and calm <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26475__Start"/>when otherwise<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26475__End"/>at periods when otherwise delirium or death <lb n="c57-0157__main__7"/>would have been my portion. My first resolution was <lb n="c57-0157__main__8"/>to quit Geneva for ever.– My country which when <lb n="c57-0157__main__9"/>I was happy & beloved was dear me <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>now in my adversity became hateful <lb n="c57-0157__main__10"/>I provided myself with a small sum of money <lb n="c57-0157__main__11"/><lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__1"/>together <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__2"/>with a few jewels <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26520__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26520__End"/>which had belonged to my mother <lb n="c57-0157__main__12"/>&<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26530__Start"/>left it.<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26530__End"/> departed<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0157__main__13"/>And now my wanderings began which are to <lb n="c57-0157__main__14"/>cease but with life – I have traversed a vast <lb n="c57-0157__main__15"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26542__Start"/>extent<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26542__End"/>portion of <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26552__Start"/>country<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26552__End"/>the earth and have endured all the hardships <lb n="c57-0157__main__16"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26565__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26565__End"/>which travellers in desarts & barbarous countries <lb n="c57-0157__main__17"/>are wont to meet – How I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>have lived I hardly know <lb n="c57-0157__main__18"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26586__Start"/>for<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26586__End"/> many times <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26591__Start"/>did<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26591__End"/>have I <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26600__Start"/>lie<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26600__End"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26604__Start"/>stretch<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26604__End"/> stretched my failing limbs on the sandy plain <lb n="c57-0157__main__19"/>exhausted & far from succour, & prayed for <lb n="c57-0157__main__20"/>death – But revenge kept me alive – I dared <lb n="c57-0157__main__21"/>not die & leave my adversary in being.—<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0157__main__22"/>When I quitted Geneva my first <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26621__Start"/>a<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26621__End"/> labour <lb n="c57-0157__main__23"/>was to gain some <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>clue by which I might trace <lb n="c57-0157__main__24"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26641__Start"/>his<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26641__End"/>the steps <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of my fiendish enemy. But my plan was unsettled and I <lb n="c57-0157__main__25"/>wandered many hours around the confines <lb n="c57-0157__main__26"/>of <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26664__Start"/>Geneva<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26664__End"/>the town uncertain what path I should pursue <lb n="c57-0157__main__27"/>As night approached I found myself at the <lb n="c57-0157__main__28"/>entrance of the cemetary, where William, Eliza<lb n="c57-0157__main__29"/>beth and my father reposed – I entered it &<lb n="c57-0157__main__30"/>approached the <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26700__Start"/>toom<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26700__End"/> tomb which marked their <lb n="c57-0157__main__31"/>graves. Every thing was silent except the <lb n="c57-0157__main__32"/>leaves of the trees which were gently<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26719__Start"/>rustled<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26719__End"/>agitated by the <lb n="c57-0157__main__33"/>breeze — The night was nearly dark and the <lb n="c57-0157__main__34"/>scene would have been <milestone spanTo="#c57-0157.09" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0157.10"/>even to an unin<lb n="c57-0157__main__35"/>terested observer<milestone spanTo="#c57-0157.07" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0157.08"/>affecting and solemn–the <lb n="c57-0157__main__36"/>spirits of the departed seemed to flit around and <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to cast a <lb n="c57-0157__main__37"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26772__Start"/>gentle<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26772__End"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26775__Start"/>hallow<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26775__End"/><lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__1"/>shadow <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__2"/>which <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__3"/>was felt but seen notaround the head of the mourner.<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26798__Start"/>But<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e26798__End"/><lb n="c57-0158__main__1"/>the deep grief <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26809__Start"/>that I at first<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26809__End"/><lb n="c57-0158__left_margin__1"/>which this <lb n="c57-0158__left_margin__2"/>scene had <lb n="c57-0158__left_margin__3"/>at first <lb n="c57-0158__left_margin__4"/>excited felt quickly gave <lb n="c57-0158__main__2"/>way to rage & despair – They were dead and I lived – Their <lb n="c57-0158__main__3"/>murderer also lived & to destroy him I must drag <lb n="c57-0158__main__4"/>out my <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26834__Start"/>we<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26834__End"/> weary existence. I knelt on the earth <lb n="c57-0158__main__5"/>and with <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26839__Start"/>a<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26839__End"/> quirvering lips exclaimed – By the <lb n="c57-0158__main__6"/>Sacred earth <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>on which I kneel <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26858__Start"/>on<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26858__End"/>, by the shades <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>that wander <lb n="c57-0158__main__7"/>near me. By the deep & eternal grief that <lb n="c57-0158__main__8"/>I feel I swear — And by thee oh night and by <lb n="c57-0158__main__9"/>the spirits that preside over thee I swear <lb n="c57-0158__main__10"/>to pursue the dæmon who caused this misery <lb n="c57-0158__main__11"/>untill he or I shall <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26884__Start"/>fall<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26884__End"/>perish in a mortal <lb n="c57-0158__main__12"/>conflict – For this purpose I will preserve <lb n="c57-0158__main__13"/>my life — To execute this <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>dear revenge will I again <lb n="c57-0158__main__14"/>behold the sun &<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>tread the green herbage of earth <lb n="c57-0158__main__15"/>which otherwise should vanish from my <lb n="c57-0158__main__16"/>eyes for ever – And I call on you spirits of <lb n="c57-0158__main__17"/>the dead & you wandering ministers of ven<lb n="c57-0158__main__18"/>geance to aid me & conduct me in my <lb n="c57-0158__main__19"/>work. Let the cursed & hellish monster <lb n="c57-0158__main__20"/>drink deep of agony – <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26940__Start"/>And his heart<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26940__End"/> Let <lb n="c57-0158__main__21"/>him feel the despair that now torments <lb n="c57-0158__main__22"/>me.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0158__main__23"/>I had begun my adjuration with <lb n="c57-0158__main__24"/>solemnity & an awe that almost assured <lb n="c57-0158__main__25"/>me that the shades of my murdered friends <lb n="c57-0158__main__26"/>heard & approved my <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26961__Start"/>oath<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26961__End"/>devotion – But the <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26970__Start"/>furies<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26970__End"/><lb n="c57-0158__main__27"/>possessed me as I concluded it &<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26977__Start"/>I was<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e26977__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>rage choaked <lb n="c57-0158__main__28"/>my utterance. I was answered through the <lb n="c57-0158__main__29"/>stillness of night by a loud & fiendish laugh– <lb n="c57-0158__main__30"/>It rung my ears long and heavily; the <lb n="c57-0158__main__31"/>mountains re-echoed it and I felt as if <lb n="c57-0158__main__32"/>all Hell surrounded me with mockery <lb n="c57-0158__main__33"/>and laughing—Surely in that moment I <lb n="c57-0158__main__34"/>should have been possessed by frenzy <lb n="c57-0158__main__35"/>and have destroyed <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27006__Start"/>t<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27006__End"/> my miserable exis<lb n="c57-0159__main__1"/>tence, <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27022__Start"/>But<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27022__End"/>but that my vow was heard and I <lb n="c57-0159__main__2"/>was reserved for vengeance – The laughter <lb n="c57-0159__main__3"/>died away <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27036__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27036__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>when a well known and <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27047__Start"/>detested<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27047__End"/><lb n="c57-0159__main__4"/>abhorred voice apparently close to my ear ad<lb n="c57-0159__main__5"/>dressed me in an audible whisper – I am sa<lb n="c57-0159__main__6"/>tisfied, <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27065__Start"/>it said,<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27065__End"/> miserable wretch, you have <lb n="c57-0159__main__7"/>determined to live & I am satisfied – I darted <lb n="c57-0159__main__8"/>towards the place from which the <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27073__Start"/>moon<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27073__End"/> sound <lb n="c57-0159__main__9"/>proceeded but the <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27080__Start"/>wretch<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27080__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27087__Start"/>villain<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27087__End"/>devil eluded my grasp. <lb n="c57-0159__main__10"/><del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27096__Start"/>When<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27096__End"/> suddenly the broard disk of the moon <lb n="c57-0159__main__11"/>arose and shone fully upon the dæmon <lb n="c57-0159__main__12"/>who fled.his ghastly & distorted shape, as he fled with<lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__1"/> more than <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__2"/>mortal speed.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0159__main__13"/>I persued <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>him;– & for many months this <lb n="c57-0159__main__14"/><lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__1"/>pursuit has been my task. Guided by a slight clue <lb n="c57-0159__main__15"/>I <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27152__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27152__End"/> followed the windings of the Rhone <lb n="c57-0159__main__16"/>but vainly – The mediterranean appeared <lb n="c57-0159__main__17"/>and by a strange chance I saw the fiend <lb n="c57-0159__main__18"/>enter by night & hide himself in a vessel <lb n="c57-0159__main__19"/>bound for the black sea – I followed him <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__1"/>I knew the <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__2"/>vessel in which <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__3"/>he was concealed <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__4"/>& he escaped me <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__5"/>I know not <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__6"/>how.<lb n="c57-0159__main__20"/><del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27184__Start"/>Along the<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27184__End"/> Amidst the wilds of Tartary&<lb n="c57-0159__main__21"/>Russia although he still <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27191__Start"/>escaped<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27191__End"/>evaded me <lb n="c57-0159__main__22"/>I have ever followed in his track – Some<lb n="c57-0159__main__23"/>times the peasants scared by his horrid <lb n="c57-0159__main__24"/>Apparition informed me of his path <lb n="c57-0159__main__25"/>Sometimes he himself who feared that <lb n="c57-0159__main__26"/>if I lost all trace I should despair & die <lb n="c57-0159__main__27"/>often left some mark to guide me –The <lb n="c57-0159__main__28"/>snows descended on my head & I saw the <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27220__Start"/>mark<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27220__End"/>print<lb n="c57-0159__main__29"/>of his huge step on the white plain –To <lb n="c57-0159__main__30"/>you are fast enterring on life, & care is new to you &<metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0159.08">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark> agony unknown how can <lb n="c57-0159__main__31"/><del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27255__Start"/>I describe<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27255__End"/>you understand what I have felt & still feel. <lb n="c57-0159__main__32"/>Cold, want &<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27266__Start"/>thirst<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e27266__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>fatigue were the least pains <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__1"/>which I was <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__2"/>destined to endure;<lb n="c57-0159__main__33"/>I was cursed by some devil & bore about <lb n="c57-0159__main__34"/>with me my eternal Hell – Yet still a <lb n="c57-0159__main__35"/>spirit of good followed & directed my steps<lb n="c57-0160__main__1"/>and when I most murmured would suddenly <lb n="c57-0160__main__2"/>extricate me from my seemingly insur<lb n="c57-0160__main__3"/>mountable difficulties— Sometimes when <lb n="c57-0160__main__4"/>nature overcome by hunger sunk under <lb n="c57-0160__main__5"/>the exhaustion a repast was prepared for <lb n="c57-0160__main__6"/>me in the desart that restored & inspirited <lb n="c57-0160__main__7"/>me– The fare indeed was coarse such as the <lb n="c57-0160__main__8"/>peasants of the country <del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e27333__Start"/>lived on<del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e27333__End"/>ate but I <lb n="c57-0160__main__9"/>may not doubt that it was set there <lb n="c57-0160__main__10"/>by the spirits I had invoked to aid me. Often <lb n="c57-0160__main__11"/>when all was dry <del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e27348__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e27348__End"/> the heavens cloudless <lb n="c57-0160__main__12"/>& I was parched with thirst – a slight <lb n="c57-0160__main__13"/>cloud would bedim the sky – shed the few <lb n="c57-0160__main__14"/>drops that revived me, & vanish.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0160__main__15"/>I followed when I could the courses <lb n="c57-0160__main__16"/>of rivers but the dæmon generally avoided <lb n="c57-0160__main__17"/>these as it was here that the population <lb n="c57-0160__main__18"/>of the country chiefly collected– In other <lb n="c57-0160__main__19"/><del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e27370__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e27370__End"/>places human beings were seldom <lb n="c57-0160__main__20"/>seen & I generally subsisted <metamark>^</metamark>on the wild <lb n="c57-0160__main__21"/><del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e27389__Start"/>game<del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e27389__End"/>animals that crossed my path – I had money <lb n="c57-0160__main__22"/>with me & gained the friendship of the <lb n="c57-0160__main__23"/>villagers by distributing it or bringing with <lb n="c57-0160__main__24"/>me some <del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e27412__Start"/>beast<del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e27412__End"/><metamark>^</metamark>food that I had killed <lb n="c57-0160__main__25"/>which after taking a small part I al<lb n="c57-0160__main__26"/>ways presented to those who had provided <lb n="c57-0160__main__27"/>with fire & utensils.<metamark>^</metamark>for cooking My life as it passed <lb n="c57-0160__main__28"/>thus was indeed hateful to me & it was <lb n="c57-0160__main__29"/>during sleep alone that I could taste <lb n="c57-0160__main__30"/>joy – Oh blessed sleep! often when most <lb n="c57-0160__main__31"/>miserable I sunk to repose & my dreams <lb n="c57-0160__main__32"/><del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e27454__Start"/>lu<del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e27454__End"/> lulled <metamark>^</metamark>me even to rapture – The spirit <lb n="c57-0160__main__33"/>that guarded me had surely provided <lb n="c57-0160__main__34"/>these moments or rather hours of happi<lb n="c57-0160__main__35"/>ness that I might retain strength to<lb n="c57-0161__main__1"/>fulfil my pilgrimage <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27487__Start"/>without them I should<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27487__End"/><lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__1"/>Deprived of this <lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__2"/>respite I should <lb n="c57-0161__main__2"/>have sunk under my hardships <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27503__Start"/>& misery<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27503__End"/><lb n="c57-0161__main__3"/><del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27507__Start"/>but<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27507__End"/> during the day I was <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>thus sustained &inspri<lb n="c57-0161__main__4"/>ted by the hope of night; <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27529__Start"/>& sleep – I then<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27529__End"/>for in sleep I saw <lb n="c57-0161__main__5"/>my friends my wife & my beloved country <lb n="c57-0161__main__6"/>again I saw the benevolent countenance <lb n="c57-0161__main__7"/>of my <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27543__Start"/>b<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27543__End"/> father,– heard the silver tones of <lb n="c57-0161__main__8"/>my Elizabeths voice and beheld Clerval <lb n="c57-0161__main__9"/>enjoying health & youth – Often when <lb n="c57-0161__main__10"/>wearied by a toilsome march I persua<lb n="c57-0161__main__11"/>ded myself that I was <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27566__Start"/>then<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27566__End"/> dreaming <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>until night should come&<lb n="c57-0161__main__12"/>that <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27582__Start"/>reality<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27582__End"/> I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>should then enjoy<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27595__Start"/>ed<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27595__End"/> reality <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27598__Start"/>when I was again<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27598__End"/><lb n="c57-0161__main__13"/>in the arms of my dearest friends–What <lb n="c57-0161__main__14"/>agonizing fondness did I feel for them–how <lb n="c57-0161__main__15"/>did I cling to their dear forms as sometimes they <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27617__Start"/>pursed<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27617__End"/>hauntedeven<lb n="c57-0161__main__16"/><lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__1"/>the visions of <lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__2"/>my waking <lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__3"/>hours<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27641__Start"/>my day<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27641__End"/><del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27650__Start"/>as well as night dreams<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27650__End"/> and per<lb n="c57-0161__main__17"/>suade myself that they still lived. At such <lb n="c57-0161__main__18"/>moments the vengeance that burned <lb n="c57-0161__main__19"/>within<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27665__Start"/>g<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27665__End"/> me died in my heart and I pursued <lb n="c57-0161__main__20"/>my path towards the destruction of the dæ<lb n="c57-0161__main__21"/>mon more as a task enjoined by heaven, <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0161.05">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark> as the mechanical <lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__2"/>impulse of <lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__3"/>some power of which <lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__4"/>I was uncon<lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__5"/>scious,<lb n="c57-0161__main__22"/>than the ardent desire of my soul.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0161__main__23"/>What his feelings were whom I pur<lb n="c57-0161__main__24"/>sued I <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27717__Start"/>hardly<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27717__End"/>cannot know – <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27724__Start"/>Yet<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27724__End"/>Sometimes indeed he <lb n="c57-0161__main__25"/>left marks in writing on the barks of <lb n="c57-0161__main__26"/>trees or cut on stone that guided me, <lb n="c57-0161__main__27"/>& instigated my fury — My reign is not yet <lb n="c57-0161__main__28"/>over, <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27744__Start"/>he said<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27744__End"/>was legiblein one of these <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>inscriptions–– You live &<lb n="c57-0161__main__29"/>my power is complete. Follow me –I seek <lb n="c57-0161__main__30"/>the everlasting ices of the north where you <lb n="c57-0161__main__31"/>will feel the misery of <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27774__Start"/>go<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27774__End"/> cold & frostbut <lb n="c57-0161__main__32"/>I shall not for cold is sweeter to me <lb n="c57-0161__main__33"/>than heat–<lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__1"/> to which I am <lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__2"/>impassive You will find near this place <lb n="c57-0161__main__34"/>if you follow not too tardily, a dead <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27801__Start"/>hair<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27801__End"/>hare<lb n="c57-0161__main__35"/>eat & be revived. <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27810__Start"/>for I<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e27810__End"/> Come on my enemy<lb n="c57-0162__main__1"/>we have yet to wrestle for our lives but many <lb n="c57-0162__main__2"/>hard & miserable hours will you spend <lb n="c57-0162__main__3"/>untill that period arrives"—<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0162__main__4"/>Scoffing Devils! Again do I vow vengeance <lb n="c57-0162__main__5"/>again do I devote thee miserable fiend to <lb n="c57-0162__main__6"/>torture & death never will I <del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27838__Start"/>leave<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27838__End"/>omit my search <lb n="c57-0162__main__7"/>untill he <del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27849__Start"/>dies<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27849__End"/>or I, perish. – And then with what <lb n="c57-0162__main__8"/>extacy shall I <del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27859__Start"/>fe<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27859__End"/> join my Elizabeth &<lb n="c57-0162__main__9"/>those who even <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>now prepare for me the<lb n="c57-0162__main__10"/>reward <del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27885__Start"/>for<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27885__End"/>of my tedious &<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27892__Start"/><del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27892__End"/> horrible <lb n="c57-0162__main__11"/>pilgrimage<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0162__main__12"/>As I pursed <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>still my journey <del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27912__Start"/>still<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27912__End"/> to the <lb n="c57-0162__main__13"/>northward<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27917__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27917__End"/> the snows <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>thickened,& cold encreased to an <lb n="c57-0162__main__14"/>almosin ae degree almost too severe to support. <lb n="c57-0162__main__15"/>The peasantry were shut up in their hovels <lb n="c57-0162__main__16"/>and only a few of the most hardy ventured <lb n="c57-0162__main__17"/>forth to seize the animals whom starvation <lb n="c57-0162__main__18"/>had forced forth to seek for prey. The rivers <lb n="c57-0162__main__19"/>were covered with ice and no fish could <lb n="c57-0162__main__20"/>be procured. The triumph of my enemy <lb n="c57-0162__main__21"/>encreased with the difficulty of my labours <lb n="c57-0162__main__22"/>One <del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27960__Start"/>en<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e27960__End"/> inscription that he left was in <lb n="c57-0162__main__23"/>these words – Prepare – your toils only begin – <lb n="c57-0162__main__24"/>Wrap yourself in furs & provide food for <lb n="c57-0162__main__25"/>we shall soon enter on a journey where <lb n="c57-0162__main__26"/>you sufferings will satisfy my everlasting hatred" My cou<lb n="c57-0162__main__27"/>rage& perseverance were inspired with <lb n="c57-0162__main__28"/>new strength by these difficulties I resolved <lb n="c57-0162__main__29"/>not to fail in my purpose and calling <lb n="c57-0162__main__30"/>heaven to support me I continued with <lb n="c57-0162__main__31"/>unabated fervour to traverse immense <lb n="c57-0162__main__32"/>desarts untill the occean appeared at a <lb n="c57-0162__main__33"/>distance and formed the utmost boundary <lb n="c57-0162__main__34"/>of the horizon –Oh How unlike it was to the <lb n="c57-0162__main__35"/>blue seas of the south Covered with ice it <lb n="c57-0162__main__36"/>was only to be distinguished from land by<lb n="c57-0163__main__1"/>its superior wildness & ruggedness—The greeks wept <lb n="c57-0163__main__2"/>when they saw the mediterranean from the hills <lb n="c57-0163__main__3"/>of Asia and hailed with rapture the boundary of <lb n="c57-0163__main__4"/>their toils – I did not weep but I knelt down & thanked <lb n="c57-0163__main__5"/>my <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28041__Start"/>guardian<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28041__End"/> guiding spirit with a full heart <lb n="c57-0163__main__6"/>for conducting me safety towards the place where <lb n="c57-0163__main__7"/>I hoped notwithstanding my adversarys threat to <lb n="c57-0163__main__8"/>meet & grapple with him — <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28050__Start"/>For<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28050__End"/> some weeks before <lb n="c57-0163__main__9"/><lb n="c57-0163__left_margin__1"/>this <lb n="c57-0163__left_margin__2"/>period I had procured a sledge & dogs and thus traversed <lb n="c57-0163__main__10"/>the snows with inconceivable speed I know not <lb n="c57-0163__main__11"/>whether the fiend possessed the same advantages <lb n="c57-0163__main__12"/>but I found that as before I had <metamark function="insert" place="sublinear">^</metamark>daily lost <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28081__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28081__End"/> the <lb n="c57-0163__main__13"/>advantage in my persuit I now gained on him <lb n="c57-0163__main__14"/>so much that when I for the first time <lb n="c57-0163__main__15"/>saw the occean– he was but one days journey <lb n="c57-0163__main__16"/>in advance & I hoped soon to intercept him <lb n="c57-0163__main__17"/>With new courage therefore I pressed on & in <lb n="c57-0163__main__18"/>two days arrived at a wretched hamlet on <lb n="c57-0163__main__19"/>the sea shore. I enquired concerning the fiend <lb n="c57-0163__main__20"/>& gained every information –A gigantic <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28101__Start"/>devil<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28101__End"/><lb n="c57-0163__main__21"/><lb n="c57-0163__left_margin__1"/>monster they said had arrived the night before –Armed <lb n="c57-0163__main__22"/>with a gun and many pistols & putting <metamark function="insert" place="sublinear">^</metamark>to flight the inha<lb n="c57-0163__main__23"/>bitants of a solitary cottage <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28132__Start"/>to flight<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28132__End"/> through <lb n="c57-0163__main__24"/>fear of his <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28137__Start"/>horr<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28137__End"/> terrific appearance, he had <lb n="c57-0163__main__25"/><del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28146__Start"/>seized on<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28146__End"/><lb n="c57-0163__left_margin__1"/>carried off their store of <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28158__Start"/>wn<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28158__End"/> winter food <lb n="c57-0163__main__26"/>& placing it in a sledge to draw which he <lb n="c57-0163__main__27"/><del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28166__Start"/>had<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28166__End"/>had seized on a numerous drove of trained <lb n="c57-0163__main__28"/>dogs – he had harnessed<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>them– & the same night <lb n="c57-0163__main__29"/><del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28187__Start"/>had<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28187__End"/> to the <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28190__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28190__End"/> joy of the horror struck villagers <lb n="c57-0163__main__30"/><lb n="c57-0163__left_margin__1"/>had pursued his journey across the <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28201__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e28201__End"/> sea <lb n="c57-0163__main__31"/>in a direction that led to no land & they <lb n="c57-0163__main__32"/>conjectured that he must be speedily destroyed <lb n="c57-0163__main__33"/>in the breaking of the ice or frozen by the <lb n="c57-0163__main__34"/>eternal frost.–<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0163__main__35"/>On hearing this information I suffered a tem<lb n="c57-0164__main__1"/>porary fit of despair – he had escaped me and I <lb n="c57-0164__main__2"/>must now commence a destructive & almost <lb n="c57-0164__main__3"/>endless journey across the mountainous ices <lb n="c57-0164__main__4"/>of the occean – amidst cold that few of the <lb n="c57-0164__main__5"/>inhabitants could long endure &<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28238__Start"/>how could<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28238__End"/><lb n="c57-0164__main__6"/><lb n="c57-0164__left_margin__1"/>whih, I <del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28250__Start"/>ex<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28250__End"/>the native of a genial & su<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>nny climate <lb n="c57-0164__main__7"/><lb n="c57-0164__left_margin__1"/>could not hope to survive. Yet at the idea that the <lb n="c57-0164__main__8"/>fiend should <del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28280__Start"/>lif<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28280__End"/> live & be triumphant my <lb n="c57-0164__main__9"/>rage and vengeance returned & like a <lb n="c57-0164__main__10"/>mighty tide overwhelmed every other fee<lb n="c57-0164__main__11"/>ling. After <del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28294__Start"/>tasting<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28294__End"/> a slight repose during <lb n="c57-0164__main__12"/>which the spirits of the dead hovered round <lb n="c57-0164__main__13"/>me & instigated me to toil & revenge I <lb n="c57-0164__main__14"/>prepared for my journey.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0164__main__15"/>I exchanged my land sledge for <lb n="c57-0164__main__16"/>one fashioned for the ruggedness of the <lb n="c57-0164__main__17"/><lb n="c57-0164__left_margin__1"/>frozen ocean and purchasing a plentiful stock <lb n="c57-0164__main__18"/>of provisions I departed from land. How <lb n="c57-0164__main__19"/>many days have passed since then I know <lb n="c57-0164__main__20"/>not but I have endured misery <del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28327__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28327__End"/>which<lb n="c57-0164__main__21"/>nothing but the eternal sentiment <del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28337__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28337__End"/><lb n="c57-0164__main__22"/><lb n="c57-0164__left_margin__1"/>of a just revenge burning within my heart could have enabled <lb n="c57-0164__main__23"/>me to support. Immense & rugged moun<lb n="c57-0164__main__24"/>tains of ice often <del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28364__Start"/>barred up my<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28364__End"/><del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28367__Start"/>par<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28367__End"/><lb n="c57-0164__main__25"/>barred up my passage and I often heard <lb n="c57-0164__main__26"/>the <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>earthquake & the thunder of the ground sea which threatened my <lb n="c57-0164__main__27"/>destruction but again a frost came that <lb n="c57-0164__main__28"/>secured me.<lb n="c57-0164__left_margin__1"/>& made the <lb n="c57-0164__left_margin__2"/>paths of the <lb n="c57-0164__left_margin__3"/>sea, secure.and I followed the slight <lb n="c57-0164__main__29"/>tracts that my enemy had left – By the <lb n="c57-0164__main__30"/><del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28416__Start"/>consumation<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28416__End"/>quantity of provision <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>which I have consumed I should guess <lb n="c57-0164__main__31"/>that I had passed <del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28437__Start"/>three<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28437__End"/><del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28440__Start"/>two<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28440__End"/><del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28447__Start"/>months<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28447__End"/>three weeks in this <lb n="c57-0164__main__32"/>journey – And <del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28459__Start"/>despair<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e28459__End"/>despondency & grief– often wrung bitter <lb n="c57-0164__main__33"/>drops from my eyes — Despair indeed had <lb n="c57-0164__main__34"/>almost secured her prey & I should soon <lb n="c57-0164__main__35"/>have sunk under this misery– When once<lb n="c57-0165__main__1"/>after the poor animals that carried me <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28479__Start"/>along<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28479__End"/> had <lb n="c57-0165__main__2"/>with incredible toil gained the summit of an ice <lb n="c57-0165__main__3"/>mountain <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28486__Start"/>Th<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28486__End"/> they paused to rest and one unable to <lb n="c57-0165__main__4"/>move <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28494__Start"/>sunk<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28494__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>sinking under the toil died—I <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28505__Start"/>f<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28505__End"/> viewed the expance <lb n="c57-0165__main__5"/>before, with anguish; when suddenly my eye was <lb n="c57-0165__main__6"/>arrested by a dark speck on <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the dusky plain – I strained my <lb n="c57-0165__main__7"/>sight to <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28530__Start"/>view<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28530__End"/>discover what <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28537__Start"/>indee<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28537__End"/> it could be & uttered a wild <lb n="c57-0165__main__8"/>cry of extacy when I distinguished a sledge dogs &<lb n="c57-0165__main__9"/><del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28549__Start"/>a hideous<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28549__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the distorted proportions of a well known form <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28560__Start"/>moving<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28560__End"/><del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28563__Start"/>away<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28563__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>within. Oh <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28571__Start"/>hope<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28571__End"/> with what <lb n="c57-0165__main__10"/>a burning gush did hope revisit my heart – warm <lb n="c57-0165__main__11"/>tears filled my eyes which I hastily wiped away <lb n="c57-0165__main__12"/>that they might not <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28587__Start"/>be present in them to<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28587__End"/> intercept the view I had of the <lb n="c57-0165__main__13"/>fiend. I followed— but still the dew dimmed my <lb n="c57-0165__main__14"/>sight untill giving way to the emotions that <lb n="c57-0165__main__15"/>oppressed me I wept aloud.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0165__main__16"/>But this was not the time for delay <lb n="c57-0165__main__17"/>I disincumbered the<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28610__Start"/>ir<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28610__End"/> dogs of their dead compa<lb n="c57-0165__main__18"/>nion<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28620__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28620__End"/> gave them a plentiful portion of <lb n="c57-0165__main__19"/>food and after an hours repose which was abso<lb n="c57-0165__main__20"/>lutely necessary & yet which was bitterly irksome <lb n="c57-0165__main__21"/>to me I continued my path — The sledge was <lb n="c57-0165__main__22"/>still visible nor did I again lose sight of it <lb n="c57-0165__main__23"/>except at the moments when for a short time <lb n="c57-0165__main__24"/>some ice rock <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28642__Start"/>hid<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28642__End"/>concealed it <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28657__Start"/>from<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28657__End"/> with its intervening crags. I indeed perceptibly <lb n="c57-0165__main__25"/>gained on <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28666__Start"/>it.<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28666__End"/>the object of my pursuit. And after about <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28673__Start"/>amo<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28673__End"/>ano<lb n="c57-0165__main__26"/>ther<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28685__Start"/>weeks<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28685__End"/>days journey I beheld myself at no <lb n="c57-0165__main__27"/>more than <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28696__Start"/>two<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28696__End"/><del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28699__Start"/>leagues<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28699__End"/>half a <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28704__Start"/>league<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28704__End"/> mile distant. <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28709__Start"/>from it<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28709__End"/><lb n="c57-0165__main__28"/>My heart bounded within me – But <lb n="c57-0165__main__29"/>now when I appeared almost within grasp <lb n="c57-0165__main__30"/>of my enemy my hopes were suddenly extinguished <lb n="c57-0165__main__31"/>and I <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28721__Start"/>became<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28721__End"/> lost all trace of him more <lb n="c57-0165__main__32"/>utterly than I had ever done before A ground <lb n="c57-0165__main__33"/>sea was heard – the thunder of its<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>progress as <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28742__Start"/>it<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28742__End"/> the wa <lb n="c57-0165__main__34"/>ters rolled & swelled beneath me became every <lb n="c57-0165__main__35"/>moment more ominous & terrific —I pressed on <lb n="c57-0165__main__36"/> but in vain<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28759__Start"/>ly<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e28759__End"/> – The wind arose the sea roared<lb n="c57-0166__main__1"/>and with the mighty shock of an earthquake <lb n="c57-0166__main__2"/>it split & cracked with a <del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e28778__Start"/>crash<del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e28778__End"/> tremendus <lb n="c57-0166__main__3"/>and overwhelming sound — The work was <lb n="c57-0166__main__4"/>soon finished in a few minutes a migh<lb n="c57-0166__main__5"/>ty ocean rolled between me & my enemy. <lb n="c57-0166__main__6"/>And I was left difting on a scattered piece <lb n="c57-0166__main__7"/>that was every moment lessening <lb n="c57-0166__main__8"/>and thus preparing for me a hideous <lb n="c57-0166__main__9"/>death – <del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e28803__Start"/>thus<del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e28803__End"/><del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e28806__Start"/>past<del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e28806__End"/>In this manner many <del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e28813__Start"/>hideous<del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e28813__End"/> hours <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>passed<lb n="c57-0166__main__10"/>several of my dogs died and I myself <lb n="c57-0166__main__11"/><del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e28833__Start"/>should have<del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e28833__End"/>was about to sunk <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>under the accumulation of hardships when I saw your vessel <lb n="c57-0166__main__12"/>riding at <del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e28852__Start"/>ansh<del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e28852__End"/> anchor and holding forth <lb n="c57-0166__main__13"/>to me hopes of succour & life. I had no <lb n="c57-0166__main__14"/>conception that vessels ever came so <lb n="c57-0166__main__15"/>far north & was astounded the sight. <lb n="c57-0166__main__16"/><del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e28863__Start"/>bu and<del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e28863__End"/> I quickly destroyed<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>partof my sledge <del
